document.full_text: o'neal, 39, made his retirement official on friday at a news conference, reiterating what he revealed in a video posted to twitter two days earlier that his n.b.a. playing days are over.
document.title: shaquille o'neal makes his retirement official
lines_and_colors: o'neal, 39, made his retirement official on friday at a news conference, reiterating what he revealed in a video posted to twitter two days earlier that his n.b.a. playing days are over.
